review: Have had for about a month, and it's been wonderful. It was incredibly easy to install. Took mere minutes to start enjoying the benefits of streaming. Would recommend to anyone and looking to get one for family members.
author: GatorGirl "Book Lover in Any Form"

review: Works as well or better than a Roku, but does not have the same number of channels available as the Roku. Finding a channel is not very easy either. Picture quality is great. Will stick with this for a while and see how it goes.
author: Action Jim "To Live Is To Die"

review: It is everything I wanted it to be &  more . I had a stroke & it a lot of enjoy ment for me.

review: for some reason it was hard to set up. I haven;t tried to set it up again since the original try.

review: Works great. Play thru AV receiver

review: The device met expectations and is very reasonably priced. A good purchase, especially for Prime members.

review: I can't believe I waited so long to buy it!

review: The fire stick is awesome. I travel a lot and this is the only device that works on the hotel WiFi. Setup was a breeze, I was up and running in less than 10 mins. Loving it now....
